content: Fix TypeScript compilation errors in backend route handlers (auth.ts, families.ts) - add proper Express Request/Response type annotations
Ensure all TypeScript strict mode requirements are met across backend
Fix frontend test failures in Login/Register components - form validation error message rendering
Fix frontend loading state management issues
Create proper .env files for development and production environments
Remove hardcoded JWT secret from docker-compose.yml and use secure secrets
Implement comprehensive error handling in backend routes
Add proper Prisma error handling throughout backend
Add input sanitization and validation to all endpoints
Add proper database constraints and indexes to Prisma schema
Improve Prisma schema for data integrity
Add error handling for localStorage access in frontend
Improve error boundaries and retry logic in frontend
Ensure backend tests compile and run successfully
Run comprehensive test suite and fix any remaining failures
